name: Dodge Or Die!
description:
This is a 2 player sports game created for the "Mini Jam 86: Sports" hosted by ZahranW & KingW.

The Theme of this jam is "No Stopping".

CONTROLS:

WASD (left player) or Arrow keys  (right player)

RULES:

Dodge the ball and try to hit your enemy with it.

If the ball crosses over the middle line, it will mimik your movement.

You can hit your adversary by remotely controlling the ball.

As soon as the ball hits the wall on the back you loose control over it and it keeps rolling until it crosses the middle line again.

Everytime you are hit, you loose a part of your playing field.

Art: @HerrNock

Music: @CobbieCobbie

Mechanics: @locojoetive
